Original Text:
Katrina-Vicky introduce son Vihaan Kaushal, share first pic
Katrina Kaif and Vicky Kaushal have revealed the name of their son, Vihaan Kaushal. The baby boy was born on November 7, 2025.
Actors Katrina Kaif and Vicky Kaushal have revealed the name of their son, Vihaan Kaushal, while sharing his first photograph with the public.

The couple posted a joint note along with an image that captured their newborn’s tiny hand gently wrapped in his parents’. In the post, Katrina and Vicky described their son as their “prayers answered,” marking the announcement with an emotional message of gratitude.

Introducing him to the world by name, the actors captioned their latest post, “Our ray of light — Vihaan Kaushal. Prayers are answered. Life is beautiful. Our world is changed in an instant. Gratitude beyond words (sic).”
Summary: Katrina-Vicky introduce son Vihaan Kaushal, share first pic with the public . The couple posted a joint note along with an image that captured their newborn’s tiny hand gently wrapped in his parents’. The baby boy was born on November 7, 2025.
